name: Biba&Boba&Ladder
description:
They say that teamwork is a key to success. Well, let's check it out, shall we?

In the game of Biba&Boba&Ladder you or with a teammate are taking the role of two unlucky builders that need to carry the ladder to the top.

Yes, that's it, but do you think that you are actually good enough to complete the level? Getting over it and Pogostuck are sending their regards.

Key features
  • Vibrant and atmospheric pixel art
  • Memorable retro music and sound
  • Hardcore gameplay with focus on patience and precision
  • Legendary heroes Biba & Boba are on your screens again
Tutorial

Move the ladder to the top without falling. It's that simple. Use WASD and arrow keys for controlling the characters. Remember, this game doesn't tolerate rushing, so be careful and watch your step.

Credits

Wapi (Twitter) - game director

Retrogrape (itch.io) - pixel art

UrHomie (itch.io) - audio design
